doc:
Heather McAdam https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heather_McAdam 0 Heather McAdam (born January 24, 1968) is an American actress. McAdam's major acting projects have included the roles of Catherine "Cat" Margolis in the television series Sisters (1991–96), Dwana Pusser in Walking Tall (1981), and Michelle Ryan in Salvage 1 (1979). She has also made guest appearances on several other TV shows including Touched by an Angel, Beverly Hills 90210, Quantum Leap, The Facts of Life. and Matlock. McAdam was nominated for a Young Artist Award in 1983 in the category of 'Best Young Actress in a Television Special' for her role as Jo Davis in the CBS Afternoon Playhouse special Just Pals. Heather_McAdam ( born January_24 , 1968 ) is an_American_actress . McAdam was_nominated for a_Young_Artist_Award in 1983 in the_category of '_Best_Young_Actress in a_Television_Special ' for her_role as Jo_Davis in the_CBS_Afternoon_Playhouse_special_Just_Pals .
